title: How Pierson Gained 9 Million TikTok Followers in 1 Year
description: Reed welcomes Pierson Wodzynski for the first live Creator Economics episode! Hear her thoughts on growing on TikTok, transitioning into Youtube, and growing her brand with her online platform. What's the best way to grow on TikTok? What's her intro strategy and how does she track AVD/CTR? Hear all the answers and more in this episode.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
